summary: Fred and Hermione's relationship has been full of teasing and jokes, but also of deep care and understanding. Fred was always amazed by Hermione's intelligence and beauty, and was willing to go to any lengths to make sure she was safe and happy. Hermione too was touched by Fred's loyalty and showed her appreciation with a passionate kiss. They have grown closer over time and their friendship is now a heartwarming reminder that even the unlikeliest of people can form meaningful relationships.
